page.title: 05Employment,Trade & Industry
page.content: The farms in this area with the exception of a nearby mushroom grower, {employ}relatively{little labour,}and most local residents commute to nearby towns, or to London, for work. {Rural trade,}the sale of eggs, goats milk, or farm produce is carried on at many farm gates. There is a{kennels}specialising in the training of greyhounds, which attracts owners from all over Sussex and the Home Counties. There is a limited amount of{tourist {related trade}such as bed and break- fast, a farm providing cream teas, and a few farm-based caravans providing self-catering holiday facilities. There are two well-patronised{public {houses,}The Bull and The Wheatsheaf, in the area, the latter of which provides meals.
